nodes.text: Tarm was a Human male and villager on the planet Jomark.

He and Svan became involved in a dispute over wage payment. Luke Skywalker and Joruus C'baoth sensed the disturbance from outside the house and arrived intending to mediate. Though they sided with Tarm, Svan did not agree and was prepared to fire his slugthrower. The dispute ended with C'baoth blasting the man with Force lightning.
